item.title: Whats wrong with my code im attempting to make?

item.description:
@Devil_Cry wrote:

Oh lol me being stupid forgot i had herbs… so i edited the lvling for herbol a bit and missed around with ids and cam up with this

				else if(itemUsed == ITEM ID && useWith == ITEM ID2) {
					if(playerLevel[15] >= 0) {
						deleteItem(ITEM ID, getItemSlot(ITEM ID), 1);
						deleteItem(ITEM ID2, getItemSlot(ITEM ID2), 1);
						addItem(ITEM ID3, 1);
						addSkillXP(XP, LVL NUMBER);
					} else {
						sendMessage("Insert txt here??");
					}
				}

Anything wrong with it b4 i go useing it ??

item.title: Whats wrong with my code im attempting to make?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

else if (useItemID == 6651 && useItemID == 6644)//Crystal on crystal { if(playerLevel[18] >= 90) { deleteItem(6651, GetItemSlot(6651), 1); deleteItem(6644, GetItemSlot(6644), 1); addItem(6653,1); startAnimation(883); addSkillXP(1, 7); sendMessage("TEST!!!!"); } else if (playerLevel[18] <=90) { sendMessage("You need 90 (skill) to do this"); } }

What skill are you trying to put exp on and how much exp?

So…
whats wrong with this ??

else if (useItemID == 6651 && useItemID == 6644)//Crystal on crystal { if(playerLevel[18] >= 90) { deleteItem(6651, GetItemSlot(6651), 1); deleteItem(6644, GetItemSlot(6644), 1); addItem(6653,1); startAnimation(883); addSkillXP(1, 7); } else { sendMessage("TEST!!!!"); } }
